label: Program Launch
description: EHR-based data collection begins. 29 participating FQHCs submit 3.5M visit records â€” replacing the legacy paper abstraction model.

label: Rapid Scale-up
description: Centers grow from 29 to 64. First public dashboard released with preliminary estimates for visit volume and top diagnoses.

label: Full Operation
description: 95+ FQHCs contributing 9M+ visit records annually. Maternal health and chronic disease modules added to the dashboard.

label: Outcome Linkages Live
description: National Death Index (NDI) mortality linkage released for approved projects. Respiratory disparities dashboard module launched.

label: Social Context Linkages
description: HUD housing assistance linkage and Medicaid enrollment linkage become available through FSRDC. Expanded race/ethnicity subgroups added to dashboard.

label: Next Generation Files
description: New longitudinal analytic files, near-real-time dashboard updates, and combined multi-linkage datasets planned for approved research.
